data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Cases describe what a noun or pronoun does in a sentence. When a noun ____ pronoun ____ the ____ of a sentence, it ____ considered ____ be ____ the ____ case. For ____, ____ the ____ `` I ate ____ apple '', I is ____ subject ____ the ____ is ____ direct ____. You will learn more about cases as the course continues.
data.partBlankContent: Cases describe what a noun or pronoun does in a sentence. When a noun o_ pronoun i_ the sub____ of a sentence, it i_ considered t_ be i_ the nomin_____ case. For exa____, i_ the sent____ `` I ate a_ apple '', I is t__ subject a__ the ap___ is t__ direct obj___. You will learn more about cases as the course continues.
data.answer: 格描述名词或代词在句子中的作用。当一个名词或代词是句子的主语时，它被认为是主格。例如，在“I ate an apple”这句话中，I是主语，apple是直接宾语。随着课程的继续，您将了解更多关于案例的知识。
